text:
Aur first year room partner, and more than that bhai. Tumhara room was like hamara room kabhi bhi aake aaraam karna.First year se last year tak sath hi rahey hai. Mini militia khlene ke bahane kafi masti kiye hai. Last sem me sath me volleyball khelna, room pe chill marke projector pe movies dekhna aur wall pe hamara aur raju ka drawing to yaad hi rehega. Concentration to tera alag level ka hai, kaan ke pas chillana parta tha kuch bolna ho to. 
Agey milte hai bangalore me jab corona kam ho, sath hi rehenge aspas.
author: Harshit  Kumar

text:
Bhai tere sath to bahut masti kiye hain first se last year tak. Assignment, project aur bhi kahi sare cheez to sath me kiye hai. Mini militia, sometime Pubg, aur snehan ke room pe roj din ka bulla katna. Tu jo bolta tha usme se adhi cheeze to tum aise hi man se bana dete the, par ussi ko leke agey bakwas chalta rehta tha hamara ğŸ˜‚. Aur tumko uthana was like deewar pe pathar maarna. Aise hi agey bangalore me bhi milke baatey karte hai. 
Aur haan mere room pe jo likha hai wo yaad hai na  "kon kiska beta hai"ğŸ˜‚.
author: Harshit  Kumar

text:
Aur bhai kitna masti kiye hai 2nd year ke baad hamlog. Waise to first year se tumko jante the thora thora baat hota tha, but 2nd year ke baad to ham roj din hi masti karte the. Waise tere room pe random bakwas kisi cheez pe karne me maja aata tha.Speaker pe songs kon chalayega ğŸ˜‚, kon kiska beta haiğŸ˜‚ğŸ˜†, raju ki maarna sath me . Raju, archies,achyut sab milke ek jagah bakchodi karte rehte the tere room pe. Assignment, lectures, exam to sath hi me chalta rehta tha. 
Agey milte hai bangalore me.ğŸ˜
author: Harshit  Kumar
